articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese President
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Tran  Dai  Quang upon his election as president of Vietnam at the 11th meeting of the 13th National Assembly of Vietnam.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop in the drive for the common cause.
					
					 It wished the Vietnamese president good health, happiness and success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Nobody Can Block DPRK's Advance: Its NDC Spokesman
articles.content:
Nobody Can Block DPRK's Advance: Its NDC Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued a statement on Sunday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and other hostile forces are making last-ditch efforts to attack the former in a flock to swallow it up.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and hostile forces' frantic racket to stifle the DPRK has reached an unprecedented phase.
					
					 The Leningrad blockade which struck terror into the hearts of people as a pronoun of the harshest sanction in the world history of wars and the Caribbean crisis in the Cold War era can hardly stand comparison with the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula at present. 
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. is still not aware that the hostility it has persistently pursued towards the DPRK for over a century since the start of its stand-off with the latter is so anachronistic and suicidal one that it precipitates its self-destruction.
					
					 It is a hard reality that the U.S. illegal "high-profile sanctions" reinforces the persevering will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK, the former's outrageous military pressure makes them hold more tightly Songun as an all-powerful treasured sword to annihilate the enemies and the former's terrible moves to "bring down the social system" prompt the latter to make a giant leap forward in the drive to build the greatest power in the world.
					
					 Those, who blindly yielded to the brigandish demands of the U.S. which lorded it over our planet through high-handed and arbitrary practices, domination and hegemony and backed it in its hostile moves against the DPRK veiled with "UN resolution," made a mess of their precious legacy and tradition for which nothing can compensate.
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK would like to tell the whole world what consequences the U.S. and its followers' reckless hostile moves against the DPRK have brought to this land through a fierce uncompromising confrontation between independence and subjugation, justice and injustice and progress and reactionary.
					
					1. The brigandish U.S. imperialists and their allies' barbarous "harshest sanctions" to completely stifle the DPRK economically turned Juche Korea into a matchless great power based on the principle of independence, self-reliance and self-development.
					
					2. The U.S. imperialists' unprecedented moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK to stifle it militarily created the worst crisis in which it may make a retaliatory nuclear strike at the U.S. mainland any moment. 
					
					3. The U.S. and its allies' moves to "bring down the social system of the DPRK" by splitting and destabilizing it are entailing the consequences of reducing the rotten and ailing capitalist system to dregs of history as it has lived out its days. 
					
					 Though all hues of hostile forces in the world come in attack on the DPRK with desperate efforts, they can never hold in check the dynamic advance of the great Paektusan nation along the Songun highway of sure victory under the leadership of the peerless Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 Mankind will be pleased to see how the great Paektusan nation will remain shining as a beacon of independence and symbol of justice and truth.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony of Ryomyong Street Held
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony of Ryomyong Street Held
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A ground-breaking ceremony of Ryomyong Street was held Sunday.
					 The ceremony was attended by officials of the party, armed forces, Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, service personnel, builders and other working people in the city.
					
					 Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, made an address.
					
					 He said that Marshal Kim Jong Un proclaimed the construction of the street on the spot out of his far-reaching plan to build another street in the area between the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, and Ryonghung crossroads and personally named it "Ryomyong Street".
					
					 The construction of the street is associated with the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to uphold the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu by building a modern street symbolic of the bright future of the great Paektusan nation in the Ryongnam area, that houses the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun in which President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, and a hill on which Kim Jong Il made his historic oath to add glory to Korea, the reporter said.
					
					 The reporter called on the builders to demonstrate once again the might of Songun Korea single-mindedly united around the party by completing the street without fail this year in which the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea will be held.
					
					 Speakers said that they would successfully build Ryomyong Street as one symbolic of the immutable faith of the army and people of the DPRK and Juche-oriented architectural art, communist utopia street as befitting a highly civilized socialist country and a fantastic street envied by the people the world over, true to the noble intention of the Party, and thus give a report of victory ad glory to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants started the building of a 70-story block of apartment houses.

articles.title: DPRK Taekwon-do Players Prove Successful at Asian Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Taekwon-do Players Prove Successful at Asian Championship
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Taekwon-do players came first in the countries standings by gaining the trophy and 32 medals including 25 gold medals at the 8th Asian Taekwon-do Championship held in Almaty, Kazakhstan from March 25 to 30.
					 The championship brought together more than 250 men and women players from 16 countries.
					
					 The DPRK Taekwon-do players placed first in men's and women's team pattern events.
					
					 The DPRK placed first at the men's and women's team sparring events and bagged gold medals in the men's 85 kg and above individual sparring  and in the women's 57, 51, 63, 69, 75 and 75 kg and above individual sparring events.
					
					 The DPRK players returned home Sunday.
					
					 They were warmly greeted by Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, players and coaches at Pyongyang Railway Station. 
					
					 They paid floral tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.

articles.title: Chongmyong, One of 24 Seasonal Divisions
articles.content:
Chongmyong, One of 24 Seasonal Divisions
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Chongmyong has been one of the 24 seasonal divisions in Korea, which falls on the 4th-6th of April every year.
					 It was rated as the day of clear sky and warm weather, an opportune time to begin farming. Every year about Chongmyong, farmers sowed millets, bean, red bean and vegetables like pumpkin and radish.
					
					 According to "Tongguksesigi" written in the 19th century, farmers began plowing on Chongmyong.
					
					 And the days about Chongmyong were considered to be the best brewing season.
					
					 It is a long-established custom among Koreans to visit ancestral graves on Chongmyong.
					
					 Chongmyong falls on April 4 this year.

articles.title: Traitor Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Traitor Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea in a "congratulatory message" to a religionists meeting held in Seoul on Mar. 27 slandered the DPRK once again, talking about "tyrannical rule" and "pain." At a "ceremony for the Day of Defending West Sea" earlier she behaved like a rabid dog, talking about "reckless provocation", "full preparations" and someone's "self-ruin."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					Park's reckless behavior of spouting rubbish against the DPRK and agitating confrontation with it regardless of time and place reminds one of fit of a psychopath.
					
					 This is no more than a last-ditch effort of Park who was taken aback by the might of the DPRK which is winning one victory after another, countering the U.S. and its followers' military threat, offensive and pressure with toughest measures.
					
					 The Park group of traitors should be well aware that neither nuclear threat nor "sanctions" nor large-scale joint military drills of the U.S. can ever block the dynamic advance of the DPRK. The enemy's desperate effort vindicates the DPRK's victory.
					
					 Songun Korea has turned into an invincible military power and nuclear power with tremendous nuclear deterrent despite the unprecedented moves of the imperialist allied forces' to isolate and stifle it. It is emerging an economic giant and highly civilized nation under the banner of the self-development-first principle.
					
					 Park was so foolish as to spout a litany of confrontation invectives against the DPRK but it only shows her wretched plight of the old witch waiting for her final doom in despair and horror.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korea-Japan Anti-DPRK Confab
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korea-Japan Anti-DPRK Confab
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The chief of staff of the Maritime "Self-Defense Force" of Japan held a confab with the south Korean puppet naval chief of staff in south Korea on Mar. 28 at a "formal invitation" by the south Korean navy. During the stay in south Korea, he was closeted with the south Korean puppet minister of Defense and the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff of the puppet army.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 The above-said confab was nothing but an anti-DPRK huddle to all intents and purposes.
					
					 It is needless to say that the confab is a product of the ulterior design of the puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries to tighten the "triangular military alliance" under the patronage of the U.S. and intensify their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The main method of aggression for Japan is a provocation of a war and its escalation through naval operations.
					
					 The above-said confab hints that the Japanese reactionaries' moves to launch reinvasion have entered a new phase. They do not hide this fact.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the south Korean puppet regime is asserting that the confab was aimed to "promote friendship", sheer sophism.
					
					 No matter what the puppet regime spouts rhetoric to put under carpet the aggressive nature of the confab, it only brings to light its true colors as pro-Japanese lackeys.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK remain unchanged in their will but harden their pledge to wipe out all aggressors and provocateurs to the last man, whether they are from the U.S. or Japan.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe Anniversary of April 3 Popular Uprising in S. Korea
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe Anniversary of April 3 Popular Uprising in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The April 3 popular uprising on Jeju Island, south Korea in 1948 was an anti-U.S., anti-fascist patriotic resistance of the south Korean people to put an end to the foreign domination and subjugations and to achieve national reunification, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					The uprisers on Jeju Island fully demonstrated the strong will and indomitable spirit of the south Korean people not to allow the aggression of the U.S. imperialists and outsiders and their lackeys' moves to perpetuate the national division through bloody resistance. .
					
					 The uprising taught the lesson that the U.S. imperialists are, indeed, the sworn enemy who desperately trample down the demand and aspiration of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification by massacring Koreans and one should fight against the aggressors and traitors to the last.
					
					 It is nearly 70 years since the uprising but the desire of the resistance fighters has not yet come true. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. vicious policy of aggression toward the DPRK and the pro-U.S. lackeys' acts against the nation.
					
					 The soul of the uprisers is arousing the south Korean people to a bold struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article calls on the south Korean people to turn out in popular resistance against the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to realize the desire of the uprisers.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference outside the Sejong Cultural Hall in Seoul on March 31 protesting against the Park Geun Hye regime's confrontational moves against the compatriots in the north, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The speakers there termed a confab to be held by the chief executives of the U.S., Japan and south Korea to slap harsher "sanctions against the north" a reckless act to drive the situation on the Korean peninsula to a dangerous phase.
					
					 The only way of defusing the tension on the peninsula is to conclude a peace pact with the north, they added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Russian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Russian newspaper Vladivostok on March 23.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Peruvian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Peruvian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The part dealing with national reunification of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was carried by the March 23rd-April 23rd issue of the Peruvian newspaper La Patria.
					 It carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career Praised by Russian Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career Praised by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried special write-ups from March 23 to 26 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The newspaper Vladivostok devoted one whole page to an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photos dealing with his external activities.
					
					 It lauded him as the greatest man who glorified the 20th century.
					
					 The website of the Khabarovsk Territorial Press Service  said in an article titled "Smile of the sun" that he turned the DPRK into the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, performed undying feats in accomplishing the  cause of Korea's reunification and made great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The on-line magazine Remchichi carried a similar article illustrated with pictures of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda carried a special write-up titled "Great man of 20th century" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It said that heads of state and famous personages of various countries of the world boundlessly revered and highly praised Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The internet news Yerofei-Dewe in an article praised the peerlessly great man who took care of all people with boundless benevolence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian, Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Brazilian, Peruvian Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted by organizations of Brazil and Peru on their websites on March 12 and 28 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Beaming image" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article said that the portraits of the smiling President can be seen anywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 The President, who was born at a time when Korea was under the Japanese imperialist military occupation, embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and founded the Juche idea and Songun idea, the guiding idea of the Korean revolution, and the cause of human independence.
					
					 He conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities during his protracted leadership over the revolution to enrich the Juche idea and Songun idea into an encyclopedic guideline of the struggle for sovereignty, independence and socialism and a mental treasure common to humankind. 
					
					 He led the Korean revolution to victory and encouraged the cause of human independence with his extraordinary leadership, the article noted, introducing the feats he performed for the national liberation, party and state building and national reunification.
					
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles titled "Peerlessly great man" and "Invincibility of socialist Korea" accompanied with a photo of the smiling President and a photo showing the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Serbian Politician
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Serbian Politician
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, released a statement on Mar. 28 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The statement said:
					
					 On the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the progressive people of Serbia paid the highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung, a prominent revolutionary, gifted strategist and great son of the Korean people.
					
					 The President was a political elder who dedicated his all to the development of the Korean revolution and the global movement for socialism.
					
					 He liberated the Korean people from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and turned the DPRK into a socialist land of bliss by holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 He enunciated the idea of reunifying the country independently and peacefully free from foreign interference and worked heart and soul to carry it out.
					
					 He was a genuine model of internationalists who positively supported and encouraged the peoples of various countries in their struggle for independence of their countries and the building of new society, and firmly defended the banner of socialism.
					
					 He will always be remembered by progressive mankind and his idea and cause will be successfully carried forward and accomplished by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kazakhstan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kazakhstan
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Kazakh Kim Jong Il Association for the Study and Dissemination of the Juche Idea on March 29.
					 Andrei Grishin, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to celebrate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Kazakh Figure
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Kazakh Figure
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The great force of the DPRK is based on the Juche idea which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il developed and enriched and the self-development-first principle set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Andrei Grishin, chairman of the Kazakh Kim Jong Il Association for the Study and Dissemination of the Juche Idea, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung) on March 29.
					
					 He noted that progressive mankind will soon greet the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the founding father of socialist Korea and founder of the Juche idea, and the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 As Marshal Kim Jong Un who inherited the outstanding political caliber and qualification of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is defending the socialist motherland with the military might striking terror into the U.S. and its followers, the DPRK is developing economy and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 There is nothing impossible if the DPRK holds the self-development-first principle.
					
					 We will positively study and disseminate the profound and original works of the peerlessly great men in the future too.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Zimbabwe
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A Zimbabwean preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Harare on Mar. 29.
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Namibia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Namibia
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A Namibian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Windhoek on March 29.
					 The preparatory committee decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Germany
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Germany on March 26.
					 The representative of the German branch of the Korean Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un from the Day of the Sun this year.

articles.title: Day of Sun and 7th Congress of WPK to Be Celebrated in Moldavia
articles.content:
Day of Sun and 7th Congress of WPK to Be Celebrated in Moldavia
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed by the Moldavian Pridnestrobvi Songun Revolution Anti-Imperialist Association  for the Study of Juche Idea on March 28.
					 Aleksei Bolynets, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 At an inaugural ceremony the committee decided to widely study and disseminate the works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and organize colorful political and cultural events with the Day of the Sun and the 7th Congress of the WPK as a momentum.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Moldavian Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Moldavian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Aleksei Bolynets, chairman of the Moldavian Pridnestrobvi Songun Revolution Anti-Imperialist Association for the Study of Juche Idea, praised the exploits of the peerlessly great men at an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) held on March 28.
					 He said:
					
					 We will soon greet the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the brilliant commander and peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu, and the 7th Congress of the WPK which will unfold a far-reaching blueprint for the final victory of the revolution.
					
					 On the occasion of such days we are recollecting with deep emotion the revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung who performed immortal exploits in carrying out the Korean revolution and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Thanks to the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, the DPRK won victory in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. and demonstrated the dignity of socialism of Juche far and wide.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is not only protecting the country's dignity despite the U.S. imperialists and their followers' moves for stifling it but also defending the freedom and life of the world progressive people.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will register the world-startling success in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will as ever deeply study and disseminate the classic works of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nadie podra impedir avance de RPDC, senala portavoz de CDN de RPDC
articles.content:
Nadie podra impedir avance de RPDC, senala portavoz de CDN de RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles hacen ultimos esfuerzos desesperados por aplastar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea abalanzandose en masas sobre esta, el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 3 una declaracion que senala en particular:
					Llegaron a la fase inaudita las freneticas maniobras de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles para aplastar la RPDC.
					
					El bloqueo de Leningrado, guardado en la memoria de la gente como pronombre de sancion mas brutal de la historia de guerra mundial, y la crisis del Mar Caribe del periodo de Guerra Fria son incomparables con la situacion de hoy creada en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Lo mas absurdo es que hasta hoy de mas de un siglo desde el inicio de enfrentamiento con la RPDC EE.UU. no entiende el caracter anacronico y de suicidio de su persistente politica hostil que adelanta la destruccion de si mismo.
					
					La ilicita "sancion de super-intransigencia" hizo desplegar la inflexibilidad al ejercito y al pueblo coreanos, la ofensiva militar obliga a los uniformados y civiles coreanos a tomar con mas firmeza el Songun como la espada omnipotente de exterminio a los enemigos, y las maquinaciones de "derrumbar el regimen" convierten la RPDC en la unica superpotencia.
					
					Esta realidad innegable ofrece la necesidad de reflexionarse con juicio a las pobres fuerzas que se esfuerzan por mantener su restante vida mediante la participacion en la "sancion" y el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear plegandose a las demandas del imperio yanqui, viejo lobo sin dientes.
					
					No podra compensar con nada el acto que echo a perder los preciosos patrimonios y tradiciones del pasado siguiendo a ciegas a la demanda bandidesca de EE.UU., que ha venido controlando este mundo basandose en la arbitrariedad, el despotismo, la dominacion y la hegemonia, y adhiriendose a las maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC empaquetadas como la "resolucion de la ONU".
					
					El Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC pone al desnudo ante el mundo los resultados engendrados en este territorio por las imprudentes maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC de los Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras en la enconada confrontacion que se desarrolla sin ningun transigencia ni concesion entre la independencia y subyugacion, la justicia y la injusticia, el progreso y la reaccion.
					
					1. La bestial "sancion superintransigente" de los imperialistas yanquis y sus fuerzas seguidoras tendentes a asfixiar completamente en lo economico a la RPDC, ha convertido a Corea del Juche en una unica gran potencia autarquica, autosostenida y autofortalecida.
					
					2.  Los alborotos belicos del bandidesco imperio yanqui de aplastar militarmente a la RPDC llevaron el territorio norteamericano a la situacion de extremada crisis de recibir en cualquier momento el golpe de represalia nuclear.
					
					3.  Las maquinaciones de "derrumbe de regimen" de EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras encaminadas a desintegrar la RPDC causan el resultado de desechar el regimen capitalista corrompido como basura de la historia que esta en agonia.
					
					Si bien, todas las fuerzas hostiles de este mundo hacen esfuerzos desesperados, no podran impedir jamas el avance impetuoso de la potencia Paektusan que marcha por la invencible ruta de Songun bajo la direccion del general del Songun sin igual.
					
					La humanidad experimentara con satisfaccion como brilla la potencia Paektusan como faro de la independencia y simbolo de la justicia y verdad.

articles.title: Iniciada construccion de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Iniciada construccion de avenida Ryomyong 
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en la RPDC la ceremonia de inicio de la obra de la avenida Ryomyong.
					Asistieron a la ceremonia los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales, asi como los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los constructores y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Jong Gwan. 
					
					El informante dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un proclamo en el terreno la construccion de la nueva avenida y la denomino como "avenida Ryomyong" con el gran proposito de levantarla en el tramo desde el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, sagrado lugar del Juche hasta la encrucijada de Ryonghung. 
					
					Continuo que en esta obra esta impregnado el noble proposito del Mariscal de enaltecer con gran lealtad a los grandes Lideres antecesores al levantar una avenida moderna que simboliza el radiante futuro de la potencia Paektusan.
					
					Llamo a terminar sin falta la obra en este ano significativo en que se celebra el VII Congreso del PTC para manifestar de nuevo a todo el mundo el poderio de la Corea del Songun unida monoliticamente en torno al partido. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo discursos de decision. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron que en acato al noble proposito del partido, levantaran la avenida Ryomyong como reparto que refleje la ferrea conviccion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos y el autoctono arte arquitectonico, convenga a la fisonomia del  pais civilizado socialista y se envidie por todo el mundo, y daran el parte de victoria al Mariscal.
					
					Los participantes sacaron la primera palada de la obra en el campo de construccion del rascacielos de 70 pisos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena disparates conflictivos de traidora Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena disparates conflictivos de traidora Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- El dia 27 de marzo, la traidora Park Geun-hye emitio un "mensaje de felicitacion" a una reunion religiosa convocada en Seul, ocasion en la cual volvio a calumniar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con las palabrerias como "tirania" y "sufrimiento".
					 Ademas en el "acto por dia de defensa del Mar Oeste" disparato de la "provocacion imprudente" y "autodestruccion" de alguien y la necesidad de la "perfecta disposicion".
					
					 Tal conducta grosera es igual a la locura de una psicopata.
					
					  Asi denuncia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este domingo y prosigue:
					
					  Esto no pasa de ser los esfuerzos desesperados de la asustada por el poderio de la RPDC que logra sucesivas victorias enfrentandose con las medidas super-intransigentes a la amenaza militar, la ofensiva y la presion de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites.
					
					  La banda traidora titere surcoreana debe tener presente que con la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., la sancion  y los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran tamano no pueden impedir nunca el avance vigoroso de la RPDC.
					
					  El mismo hecho de que se tornan mas siniestras las maniobras desesperadas de los enemigos evidencia que la RPDC obtiene la victoria.
					
					  Aun en medio de las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento sin precedentes de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas, la RPDC se ha convertido en la invencible potencia militar con el fuerte disuasivo nuclear y se transforma en la potencia economica y civilizada bajo la bandera de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					  Ahora Park Geun-hye echa maldiciones de todo tipo, pero esto se revela solo la sucia figura de esta fea que va hacia el arruinamiento con el pavor y la desesperacion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia complot anti-RPDC de Sur de Corea y Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia complot anti-RPDC de Sur de Corea y Japon
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- El 28 de marzo, el jefe del Estado Mayor de las fuerzas navales de autodefensa de Japon arribo al Sur de Corea por "invitacion oficial" de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas.
					Durante su estancia, realizo las conversaciones secretas con su homologo y el ministro de Defensa del Sur de Corea y el jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano. 
					
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual del dia 3, lo califica de complot anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continua:
					
					No cabe duda que la presente cita es el producto de la artimana de los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios japoneses de reajustar la "alianza militar tripartita" e intensificar la campana anti-RPDC bajo el amparo de EE.UU. 
					
					Provocar y ampliar la guerra por via maritima es el principal metodo de agresion del pais isleno. 
					
					Las conversaciones entre los jefes de Estado Mayor de las fuerzas navales del Sur de Corea y Japon insinuan que las maniobras de nueva agresion de Japon entran en una nueva etapa. Los reaccionarios japoneses mismos no lo ocultan.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos describen cinicamente que la visita del jefe del Estado Mayor de las fuerzas navales de autodefensa de Japon como una gira por el "fomento de amistad". 
					
					Los disparates de los titeres surcoreanos destinados a ocultar el caracter agresivo de la presente cita revelan mas su naturaleza vendepatria y projaponesa. 
					
					Es invariable y se centuplica la decision de venganza del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de aniquilar implacablemente a todos los invasores y provocadores.
